items.sentence: I\'m probably the only person who can help Tom do that.
I\'m really looking forward to playing tennis with Tom.
If you think it\'ll make you happy, go ahead and do it.
It was hard to resist the impulse to wring Tom\'s neck.
It\'s been three years since I started to study French.
There\'s a man at the door who wants to speak with you.
There\'s something I need to tell you before you leave.
If you\'d helped me, I could\'ve done that much faster.
If Tom asked you to jump off a bridge, would you do it?
I threw a ball to my dog and he caught it in his mouth.
